refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Launches the brlman graphical man page viewer with the man page documenting the specified MGED command name.

refsection.title: COPYRIGHT
refsection.para: This software is Copyright (c) 2016-2020 United States Government as represented by the U.S. Army Rebrlman Laboratory.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to devs@brlcad.org
